title: What To Do When There's A Flash Flood Warning While You're Driving
description: What should you do when there's a flash flood warning? In this episode, we'll walk you through why we're seeing an increase in flood events, what you should keep in your car in the event of a flood-related emergency, and how to get from point A to point B safely, if you have to drive during heavy rains.

itunes:summary: What should you do when there's a flash flood warning, while you're driving? In this episode, we'll walk you through how you can best prepare to stay safe during the heavy rain.
